name: the one where Ricardo wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the API
scenarioId: classpath:features/veterinarians/view_vet_data:the one where Ricardo wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the API
methodName: the one where Ricardo wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the API

testSteps.description: When Ricardo sends a request to get the list of veterinarians

children.description: Ricardo executes a GET on the resource /vets

restQuery.responseHeaders:
vary: accept-encoding
Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Tue, 17 Sep 2024 03:15:53 GMT

testSteps.description: Then the system should return a 200 response code

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the response status should be (200)

testSteps.description: And the response body should include the default veterinarians information

children.description: For Ricardo: Then the veterinarians in the latest api response should contain exactly the default veterinarians information

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to view the data of the veterinarians in the system
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to view the data of the veterinarians in the system
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to view the data of the veterinarians in the system
  In order to know information about the veterinarians that work in the clinic

  The default veterinarians are:
  | Name           | Specialties           |
  |----------------|-----------------------|
  | James Carter   |                       |
  | Helen Leary    | radiology             |
  | Linda Douglas  | dentistry surgery     |
  | Rafael Ortega  | surgery               |
  | Henry Stevens  | radiology             |
  | Sharon Jenkins |                       |

title: the one where Ricardo wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the API
